projectGridLines.title: Create actionable insights for a product strategy	Streamlining Supply Chain Effeciency,	Driving Data Driven Decision Making.,
projectGridLines.description:
1. Collaborate closely with the product team to define the product roadmap

2. Analyze product performance, gather user feedback, and provide insights to drive product strategy and development

3. Conduct user research and analyze feedback to understand user needs, pain points, and potential improvements.

4. Collaborate with UX/UI teams to translate user feedback into actionable product changes.

5. Benchmark industry trends, market developments, and competitors to provide insights that inform product strategy and positioning1. Propose strategies to reduce costs and improve procedures of Inventory Management

2. Create processes to ensure that all sourcing leads are meeting their personal performance standards

3. Analyze Demand and share buying projections with brand as per targets

4. Evaluate and share brand's performance scorecard periodically

5. Create and share dock hit projections, and execute dock hit plans accordingly to ensure minimum deviation from the plan6.

6. Take the lead in creating profitable ways to manage obsolete and slow-moving stock to help offset losses1. Own the development and maintenance of new and existing artifacts focused on analysis of requirements, metrics, and reporting dashboards.

2. Work on various long term projects related to beauty category and periodically asses performance metrics like conversion, supply gaps

3. Enable effective decision making by retrieving and aggregating data from multiple sources and compiling it into a digestible and actionable format.

4. Work with the category leaders across skincare/makeup/haircare/personal care to drive identification of requirements and create a detailed business analysis, outlining

problems, opportunities, and solutions.1. Partner with the Sr. Key Account Managers to create a joint business plan with the key accounts

2. Formulate and implement frameworks and strategies to manage inventory levels, manage deal prices across brands & participation in marketing events

3. Find whitespaces in the marketing opportunities on the various marketplaces to drive visibility & sales growth

4. Ideate strategies and initiatives to grow brands and categories.
